actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 106-270.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests and Public Land Management

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to dispose of land for recreation or other public purposes.
short_title: National Forest System Community Purposes Act

summary.text: National Forest System Community Purposes Act - Authorizes, and sets forth conditions for, disposal by the Secretary of Agriculture of National Forest System land to a State or its political subdivision for public or recreational purposes.

titles.title: National Forest System Community Purposes Act
A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to dispose of land for recreation or other public purposes.
